inn1.comm: Good first ball from Shoaib. It landed back of length and straightened on the middle and off stump line. Tharanga is beaten by that straightening and pushes outside the line. The ball bounds of his thigh pad
short in length, just outside off stump, defended to the off side
on the middle stump line, Tharanga stays back to defend to the on side. Three good deliveries so far from Shoaib. Three on target.
hits the deck short of length, bounces towards rib-cage, tucked behind square-leg
back of length and outside off stump, Dilshan stays back to cut it hard to third man
around the off stump line, around 144 kph, length delivery around off stump line, pushed out to the off side
Edged to third man. Full and on the middle, Tharanga was shaping to work it to the on side and edges it past the slip cordon
leg cutter that moves away from the off stump and Dilshan is beaten, driving inside the line
Carved away! fuller and a touch wider outside off and Dilshan flays it through covers. He is looking to be very aggressive here
goes hard again .. but mistimes the off drive and the ball rolls out to the off side
around 127 kmph and a wide delivery outside off stump
Whack! short in length and outside off stump, not much pace on it, and Dilshan plays the horizontal shot. A cut to point boundary. Kamran Akmal runs across to have a chat with the bowler
fuller and Dilshan goes hard with his off drive. Too hard and ends up mistiming the ball to covers. Boy, is he looking to get after Asif or what..
short and into the rib cage, tucked to square-leg
around 144 kmph, pacy bouncy delivery from short of length and outside off. Dilshan goes for a cut but is too close to the ball and is beaten
145.4 kmph, back of length delivery outside off, cut down to third man
fuller but on the legs, 148.1 kmph delivery, Tharanga pokes at it and the ball rolls behind square-leg. That was 148 k pacy delivery. Here we go. Shoaib to Dilshan

Edged between the keeper and the first slip. It pitched well ahead of the cordon and rolled away. It was around 145 kmph back-of-length delivery and Dilshan went for the cut and edged. Kamran dived but couldn't reach in time
146 kmph length delivery on the middle stump. A heavy ball as they say. Dilshan was looking to defend and the ball back spun past him and bounced past the stumps
full in length around off stump, pushed to the off side
around the off stump line, full in length, 129 kmph, pushed out to the off side

on the off stump line, fullish, Tharanga doesn't a take a step forward, just leans forward and punches it .. He almost checks the shot as he hadn't moved forward and was playing way ahead of the body. But the timing was superb and the ball kept racing away past the bowler and past mid-off
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
goes down the track, Asif shortens the length and angles it away .. left alone
Loverly off drive. Tharanga leaned forward to caress the full delivery to the right of mid-off. Superbly timed.
length delivery arhttp://cms.hq.cricinfo.org/cms/match/comms.tt2?selected=455231ound off stump, Dilshan moves forward to push it to covers
on the off stump line, 146.3 kmph, full in length, driven to covers

short in length, tilting in towards the middle and leg, Dilshan goes for the pull but jabs it to his pad. Cramped for room. He could have chosen to clip it past square-leg instead of opting for a pull shot there
146.1 kmph delivery bouncing past the off stump, Dilshan goes for the on-the-up drive but can't get bat to ball
cuts this one wide of point for a single
fiery bouncer on the off stump line, Tharanga drops his wrists, gets the bat out of the way and sways away
length delivery on the middle stump line, moving in from around the leg stump, Dilshan just had a jab at it and it goes of the inner edge to the leg side
goes for the pull, not all that short and edges it to his pad
Another inside edge. It was a length delivery slanted across Dilshan who tries to punch it through covers and edges it past the stumps
a bouncer this time and it flies over Dilshan
short of length outside off, cut to backward point
finishes the over with yet another dot ball. Maiden. Full in length and moving towards off stump, pushed out to covers
Lovely slower one, around 113 kmph, on the middle, it dipped on Tharanga who pushes it to the on side
140.9 kmph, length delivery on the off and middle stump line, pushed out to mid-off

Shoaib smiles. He spreads his arms. He doesn't run to nowhere like he used to do. Just stands there and walks towards his team-mates. Times they are changing. It was a short delivery outside off and Tharanga went for the cut but edged it to first slip.
around 145 kmph, full in length and moving through the corridor to the keeper
around the off stump, pushed towards mid-off. Sanga wants a single but Dilshan doesn't.
around 142 kmph bouncer and Sanga sways out of the line of fire. Kamran collects and smiles.
worked past square-leg for a single
Stylish. Flamboyant. It was a slightly short delivery outside off and Sanga launched himself into it. He bent his knee, held his balance and cut it hard through point.
Aamer responds with a bouncer and Sanga ducks
tries to rotate the strike with a tip and run but decides against the risky single
That bent knee again. That cut again. But a short square cover point is in place and it goes to him
around the off stump line, pushed out to the off side

Now it's the turn of Asif to smile. Courtesy a fab catch from Umar Amin. It was a gentle length delivery outside off and Dilshan goes for the on-the-up square drive. The ball flies and dips to the left of cover point where Amin dives to take it inches of the turf. It was dying on him and well to the left but he flung himself and got his palms under the ball. The Sri Lankan openers are back in the hut. The old firm of Sanga and Mahela are in.
fuller, outside off, driven to mid-off
shorter in length and outside off, Mahela thinks about cutting but lets it go

Edged but Kamran couldn't get to it. It was a lovely leg cutter around off - a classic Asif delivery - and Mahela had a lame poke at it,. Almost fatal. The gap between the keeper and slip was wide and Kamran dived but couldn't reach.
leans forward to defend the length delivery
pushes this outside off and Mahela leans across to push to covers
stays back to clip the full length delivery past square-leg. And he gets three for the effort.
A bouncer arrives and Mahela decides late to go for the pull shot. And so he couldn't pack any power behind it and the ball lobs over square-leg
back of length on the middle stump line, clipped to deep backward square-leg
around the off stump line, pushed out to the off side
just outside off, moving in, pushed out to point

Neatly done. Lots of skill behind it. He shuffled across, got in to a good position to on drive a full length delivery on the middle stump line wide of mid-on. It's a shot he plays well. He rarely goes hard on such occasions: just a firm punch at the point of impact.
Mahela dips back into Twenty20 mood and goes for a big hit over mid-on but misses it completely. He took a step out and tried to heave the leg cutter but ..
130.5 kmph back-of-length delivery outside off and Mahela punches it sweetly but straight to point
opens the bat-face to adjust to the straightening and runs it down to third man
on the off stump line, pushed to the on side of the pitch and Asif stops on his follow-through
Tip and run: He tapped close on the off side and the old pair finish the single very comfortably
Nicely timed. And wristy. Mahela got behind the line of the delivery tilting in towards middle and clipped it past square-leg

Shout for lbw Was there an inside edge on it? There was a noise. Fullish delivery on the off and middle line and Mahela shapes for the on drive and gets an inside-edge (probably!) on to his pad in front of middle. He should have gone straight. He chose to play to the on side and almost played all around it. I wish they would show a second replay. Not sure whether was an inside edge on it.
jabs this one also to his pad
well outside off stump and Mahela lets it go
clips this behind square-leg for a single
on the middle stump line, turned to the leg side
just outside off stump, run down to third man
straightens just outside off stump, defended on the front foot
around the off stump, defended to the off side
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
fuller, wider, drawing Sanga out and he obliges but ends up mistiming the cover drive. The ball rolls out to the off side
in the channel outside off and Kamran collects
fullish, on the middle and leg, turned past square-leg
Leans forward to defend to the off side
around the off stump line, pushed towards mid-off and Sanga calls Mahela for a quick single
on the off stump line, tapped to the off side
Very wristy. He leaned forward, picked the length delivery from the off and middle line and turned it wide of short fine-leg.
this time he works it from the middle to deep square-leg region
fullish on the middle and leg, pushed out to the on side
leans forward to defend the length delivery
works this away for a single
around the off stump line, jabbed out to covers
moving away from Sanga who taps it to point. Asif moves the ball both ways.
leans across to defend to the off side
Nice half-stop from Afridi. It was punched to left of mid-off , Afridi rushed across and dived to stop it .. Akhtar mopped up from mid-on
gets forward to defend. Tight over from Asif.
takes a step out and goes for the big shot over wide mid-on but edges it to his pad. Had he tried to go straighter, he might have got his boundary. Mahela looking to press on here
fuller and outside off, square driven to backward point
on the off stump line, worked to short midwicket.
taps this towards short cover point and off they rush across
around the off stump line, steered to cover point for a single
back of length on the middle and leg, clipped past square-leg
straightens around off, pushed out to the off side
nice slower one, full outside off, Mahela wanted to lift it over point and it runs down to third man. Asif smiles
short in length, cuts across Sanga who defends to the off side

another one cutting away from Sanga who this time opens the bat-face and guided it deliberately through the vacant slip cordon. Not quite having the panache and the class of a Ranatunga late cut but pretty effective
gets forward to defend to the off side
fuller outside off and Sanga pushes outside the line and edges it to fine-leg
full in length and outside off, Mahela stretched out and wanted to off drive but the bat-face shut at point of impact and the ball rolled away to the on side. Mahela winces.
pushes this down the leg side and it goes past the attempted pull shot
on the middle, slower, worked wide of midwicket for a single

almost goes back to the bowler! It seemed a harmless length delivery just outside leg and Sanga shaped to clip it to square-leg but edged it to his pad and the ball lobbed in front of him. The bowler ran towards it but it died on him very quickly
leans forward to push it to the point region
length delivery on the off stump line, pushed to the on side of the pitch
length delivery outside off stump, pushed out to backward point
short of length delivery that straightens on the off and middle line, turned to square-leg
drifts to the pads, turned down to fine-leg for a single
143.8 kmph full-length delivery outside off and Mahela drives to left of mid-off for a single
length delivery around off stump pushed out to mid-off
drops short of first slip: It was a back-of-length delivery outside off and Mahela actually went for the late cut and edged it short of the slip fielder
First signs of spin. Full on the middle and off line, pushed back to the bowler
leans forward to defend
just outside off, defended to the off side
slightly short in length, Sanga goes back to chop it through backward point
slower, fuller but on the legs, turned wide of midwicket
almost dragged on It was the slider going away from Sanga who shaped for a little cut shot and edged it past the off stump
full and well outside off stump, Mahela goes for the big shot and misses it.
drags it short and Mahela cuts to deep-point region
banged in short around off, Sanga stays beside the line to dab it just wide of backward point
works this one past square-leg for a single
from round the stumps, defended to the off side
nice shot. Another one coming in from round the stumps, Sanga got behind the line and just punched it .. through midwicket .. No violence. Just timing.
slider outside off, pushed out to point
loopy delivery, almost drops on the block hole, dug out by Mahela
slower, on the off stump line, eased down to long-on
goes back to work it towards deep midwicket
straightens on the leg and middle line, wristed to short fine-leg
gets forward to push it to the off side
short delivery outside off, Mahela cuts to Umar at backward point
full delivery outside off stump and Mahela drives well to the right of sweeper cover
fullish, on the leg stump line, shapes to flick, misses but will pick up two leg byes
gets forward to defend to the off side
short in length, around that off stump, jabbed of the edge and the ball drops in front of Sanga
brings up the hundred  in style. It was the bouncer outside off and Sanga adjusts by upper cutting it wide of third man. Neatly done. Almost very calmly. No fuss.
leans forward to play a square drive to deep point
gets forward to ping long-on
gets back to clip it past square-leg
leans forward to drive to covers
works this to the right of the fielder at covers for a single
Delicious hit over covers. He leaned forward and lifted it inside-out over extra cover
floats it slowly on the off and middle line, pushed to point
slips it down the leg side. Wide
slow again, on the off stump line, tapped to covers
around the off stump line, driven to sweeper cover
Nice shot. he leaned forward, realised there was no pace in it, waited and chipped it over wide mid-on region..
Ah now the late cut. Fabulicious. He leaned back, opened the bat-face and late-cut it to thirdman boundary. Yummy!
turns in slowly from outside off, dabbed to midwicket

Sanga falls. No it's not a tourist sight and the sparse crowd is stunned. It was floated outside off, Sanga fetched it from there and whipped it left of short midwicket.  Sharp catch. The 83-run partnership is over now.
quicker, the quickest he has bowled today or so it seems, full and on the off and middle line, pushed down to long-off
slower this time, much slower, on the leg and middle line, Mahela tries to dab it to the on side and checks the shot. The ball lobs down the wicket but doesn't reach the bowler
stays back to defend to the off side
drags it shorter and Mahela cuts to deep point
short in length and outside off stump, run down past the first slip to third man
stays back to dab it to the off side
from round the stumps, a length delivery that straightens outside off and Samaraweera is caught at the crease. He is squared-up and has a poke at it and is beaten
And again. This time Samaraweera took a small step out and tried to run it down to third man and is beaten again.
slower, shorter in length  around off, Samaraweera shuffles across and clips it past midwicket
walks forward and across the off stump line, and pushes the length delivery from outside off to mid-on
just outside off stump, skids on, mistimes the cut shot
full delivery, on driven for a single
on the off and middle line, paddled away for a single
same delivery and Samarweera plays the off drive and picks up a single to long-off
slightly short in length and outside off, cut to deep point
walks right across the stumps, gets to outside off and flicks it from there to deep square-leg
length delivery from round the stumps, pushed out to cover point
short in length, Mahela checks his pull shot and ends up swatting it to wide midwicket region
chest-high bouncer outside off and Samaraweera doesn't complete the pull shot, just gets into a horizontal position and flat-bats it towards deep midwicket
outside off stump, pushed out to point
length delivery outside off stump, hit on the up to the right of mid-off where Afridi makes a fine diving stop.
leans forward to drive back to Afridi
googly on the middle and leg line, clipped through midwicket ..
fuller, around off stump line, wristed to square-leg for a single and that's his 50. 53rd ODI Fifty. As ever a stylish innings.
slower, loopier, on the middle and leg, eased to long-on
the quickish skidder just outside off, Mahela plays the little cut but can't beat backward point
drops it slightly short and drifts to the leg and middle line, Mahela works it away to fine-leg region
short in length outside off, Samaraweera shuffled across and chopped it to backward point
gets forward this time to drive the length delivery to sweeper cover
short in length outside off, Mahela uses his wrists to send the ball to square-leg
on the good length, just outside off, eased towards mid-off for a single
walks right across, ends up outside off and Razzaq bangs it in short further outside off .. Mahela works it from there to square-leg!
Samaraweera too shuffles to the off and punches the delivery down to long-on
slow outside off stump, Samaraweera reaches across to play the paddle-sweep
leans across to dab the ball to square-leg. 150 for 3

Mahela has been given out lbw and he doesn't seem to be too happy with the decision. Reason? There was a bottom edge there. Hence the reaction from Mahela. It was a flighted off break around off stump and Mahela went for the reverse sweep and edged it to his pad. A fine innings but it's over now. Vital moment this. 150 for 4. The game could tilt either way now. Will Pakistan get ahead or will Sri Lanka move on?
turns forward to dab it to square-leg
spins in from outside off, pushed back to the bowler
goes right back to dab to the on side

And Pakistan get ahead with another strike. Soft dismissal. Samaraweera is angry with himself and crashes his bat on his pad as he walks off. It was a full delivery well outside off and Samaraweera square drove it straight to backward point.  The bottom-hand came of the handle on point of impact and he couldn't control the shot. He ended up slicing it
kicks up from short of length outside off, punched through covers
gets behind the line to defend
short in length, punched to point
short in length again, just outside off, pushed back to the bowler
fuller in length, straightens and also keeps a touch low, runs of the outer edge to third man
just outside off stump, Angelo wants to dab it to the on side and edges it back down the track
even slower, no pace on it and the dab shot finds the ball rolling to short midwicket
he moves down the track to drive to long-on
turns to the middle, worked behind square-leg
flighted outside off, tapped to short midwicket
full and just outside off, driven to long-on

short in length and just outside off and Angelo plays a very fine on-the-up hit over mid-off. The pitch has slowed down and it's not an easy shot to play but he has pulled it off. Afridi rushes back from mid-off and makes a fine sliding stop near the boundary
sharp pacy lifter outside off stump and it flies past the waft ...
lands back of length, comes in from outside off, defended to the off side

fuller, on the leg and middle line, moves past the attempted flick and hits the pad. Shoaib shouts for lbw but perhaps missing the leg stump. The replays suggest that the ball would have just kissed the outer half of the leg stump
shorter, bounces into the rib cage, pushed to the on side

Again Shoaib smiles gently. He spreads his arms and walks slowly towards his team-mates. It was delivered from a short run-up, a short delivery outside off and the batsman went for the cut shot. The ball flew quickly and slightly low to backward point where it was swallowed on the rebound. The ball popped out but the fielder dived forward to secure it. The catching has been pretty good today. Sri Lanka slid further. That Mahela wicket was indeed the turning point
outside off stump, punched to point
full and outside off stump, pushed through covers
floated full outside off stump, shapes to defend and the ball rolls to short third man
in the channel outside off, quicker and goes past the cut
skids outside off again, left alone
on the middle, straightens and Afridi thought he had his man trapped but the bat comes around at the last minute to turn the ball to square-leg
banged in short outside off stump and Angelo pulls it between deep midwicket and long-on. It seemed he hadn't connected as well he would have liked but the fielders couldn't get to it in time
full in length on the off and middle, pushed to the on side
short in length on the off and middle, punched past the non-striker
in the zone outside off stump and Maharoof shoulders arms

That smile again. That gentle jog again. No wild celebrations. The left hand slowly goes up and a smile creases his face. It was a length delivery that straightened outside off stump, Maharoof, who had left the previous delivery alone, had a poke at this one. Mistake. Gone!
hurls this one fuller outside off, left alone
sharp legbreak Whoa! It landed on the middle and spun past the defensive prod
fuller, around off, pushed back to the bowler
lands on the off and middle and slides in. worked behind square-leg

around the off and middle, turned through the vacant spaces at midwicket .. and they come back for the second run.. Afridi is not happy with his fielders and says, "Kya ho raha hai yeh?!" (What's happening out there?)
gets forward to dab it away for a single
Another little dab to midwicket and Kamran runs after the ball
takes a step forward, receives a delivery that kicks up from short of length and he pushes it to covers
short in length again , worked to midwicket
outside off stump line, run down to third man
in the zone outside off, left alone
gets forward to drive to the off side
gets forward to defend to the off side
reaches forward and works the ball from the off stump to backward square-leg
just outside off, dabbed to backward point
floated fuller, on the middle, eased to long-on
quicker, skids to the middle and leg line, dabbed past square-leg
gets forward to jab it to the on side
Big turn For the second time today. He had slowed it up on that occasion and gave it some air and rip, and the ball gripped and turned past the defensive poke

The lemon cut. The inside-edge to fine-leg boundary. A regular feature in the end overs in 80s, Full in length ,from round the stumps, Angelo goes for the big off drive and edges it past the leg stump
Ah neatly done this time. It was a slower one on the hips, he waited and played a nice little leg glance
Aamer switches back to the over the wicket. On the middle stump line, turned to the on side
kicks up towards the rib cage, tucked through midwicket for couple of runs
short in length outside off, pushed to cover point for a single
short in length and outside off, from over the wicket, punched to deep point
leans forward to tap it wide of the non striker

Stumping chance missed. Not a surprise if you have followed Kamran's career. It was down the leg side and Kula had leaned forward to flick and lost balance and had stepped well out of the crease. But Kamran doesn't collect it cleanly. Oh well
leans forward to defend
works this through the on side for a single
around the off stump lune, gets forward to defend
works it through the vacant on side- (in the circle ie) and will come back for the second run before the fielder could come in from the deep
tip and run. It was pushed to short cover and away they run. The throw come to Kamran who breaks the stumps  but Kula dives to get back in the crease
just outside off stump, punched back to the bowler
shufles across and tries to play the paddle scoop from outside off and jabs it to his body
fuller, on the off stump line, pushed to midwicket for a single
around the off stump line, defended to the off side
short in length and outside off, Kula goes back and across and slashes it uppishly but short of the thirdman fielder
tapped close on the off side and they take the single
short in length outside off, punched to long-off
fullish, on the off and middle, driven to left of long-on
in the channel outside off, straightens after landing (as if it can do it before landing but hey ..) and Angelo is beaten, pushing inside the line
stays back to clip this past square-leg. 200 up
short in length, around the off stump, cut to backward point.
gets forward to stab a back-of-length delivery to short cover for a quick single
fullish, hint of inswing, driven to mid-off for a single
full again, reverses in, driven through the off side
short in length, mistimes the cut to extra cover
goes for the yorker, serves a low inswinging full toss, driven to long-off
a sharp well-directed bouncer on the middle stump line and it flies past Kula's head. Kula yanks his head away from the line of fire
a slower one, full and dipping in front of the middle stump line, squeezed past square-leg
short in length, on the pads, whipped past square-leg
moves outside leg and drives the really full delivery on the middle stump line to covers
Kula moves outside leg and Aamer tries to respond with a bouncer but it flies too high... Wide
takes a step forward and tries to heave the short-of-length delivery to the on side  but edges it to his body
moves outside leg and hits the full toss on the middle stump line to mid-off
full delivery again, driven to long-off for a single
Yorked! Kula took a step out and to the on side and went for the big hit but missed. Timber! He ended up yorking himself by moving forward there.
slower one outside off and Angelo has a big swing and a miss
yorker length on the middle and off, squeezed out to cover point
full in length, outside off, pushed out to point
Malinga backs to outside-leg and Shoaib follows him with a bouncer and it pings Malinga on the right shoulder.. the ball rolls away to the off side and Malinga remains expressionless.
slightly slower , short in length outside off, Malinga has a slash at it and edges it through the vacant slip cordon. Cry of agony from Shoaib
moves outside and this time Shoaib follows it with a full delivery, pushed through mid-on ..
full delivery around off, pushed down to long-off . Malinga rushes across to have a chat with his partner
full delivery, just short of the blockhole, on the middle, pushed out to extra cover
length delivery on the pads, turned behind square-leg
edged to third man boundary. It straightened around the off stump, the batsman stabbed it inside the line ..
fuller, around off stump, driven to covers

Six or caught?! Six it is. Malinga had stayed back to wallop it to right of long-on. Shoaib Malik caught it, took a step forward but his left leg touches the boundary rope and he flicks the ball back on to the field of play as he gets outside the boundary. It was a very good actually. Malinga arched back and thumped it on the up and through the line
reaches forward to push it to the off side
ah! A really slow slower one! It looped acrossl, landed on a length around off and cut away ever so gently past the off stump. Malinga stumbled out and pushed inside the line
pushes this full delivery to mid-off
low dipping full toss on the off stump line, turned to Afridi at midwicket. 50 for Angelo. Another responsible knock from this rapidly-maturing youngster.

Dropped by who else but Salman Butt It's known that he often drops catches. Somple ones at that. This was really a dolly. Malinga had sliced a full toss to him at mid-off and how did he managed to drop that? He had it covered, the ball dropped in to his palms and popped out. What a mess
hit back down the track, Razzaq stops and throws to Kamran
full delivery, pushed through mid-off
goes for the heave to the on side and ends up slicing it of the outer edge over towards sweeper cover and they come back for the second rin
full and well outside off, sliced away to third man
moves outside leg and is cleaned up by the slower one. He had a slog and a miss. Quite a handy contribution from Malinga; could prove very vital in the end
really full delivery, driven to long-on. Angelo on strike for the final delivery.
fullish, outside off, ends up as a low dipping full toss, Angelo reaches across to slice it to deep backward point.

inn2.comm: Slip and short midwicket in. Full in length, just outside off stump, pushed out to point
That Kula nip--backer. It cut back in from outside off stump and the batsman was late in getting the bat down but eventually does so to keep it out
And his two-card trick. The length delivery that straightens this time. The batsman adjusts and taps it to point
lovely delivery that shaped away late.. Shahzaib lunged out at it, pushed inside the line and was beaten

What a fab over. Two away deliveries was followed now with the delivery cutting in. Shahzaib was clueless, had nothing to offer a shield of defense and was saved by the height. The ball hit him high on the thigh pad
Slip and short midwicket. a peach of a yorker to serve first up. It zoomed in on the off stump, shaping in from outside off and Butt actually does very well to dig it out
short in length this time and outside off, Butt goes for the cut but doesn't connect

Hasta la vista baby! Full, pacy and the middle stump has been pegged back. It landed full in length, landed on the off and middle line and seamed in to go through the bat and pad gap. Clatter! Butt went neither forward or back and groped blindly outside the line.
another one curving in to the middle stump line, Umar gets the bat in front of the pad and works it through midwicket
banged in short outside off and the bouncer flies outside off stump
yorker length, swinging in to the off and middle line, just about dug out back to Malinga who stops and glares
Shahzaib continues to be tormented by Kula. It was a length delivery that straightened outside off and Shahzaib is beaten, pushes inside the line
And again! Shahzaib is not picking em, not sure whether its coming in or going out. Another tentative poke to a delivery that left him
he does a smart thing this time; he walked out a couple of steps, Kula was forced to  change his length and he tucked it behind square-leg
in the zone outside off stump, Umar Amin shoulders arms
back of length on the middle, pushed to the off side
fullish, around off and middle, pushed out to the off side
slings a full delivery outside off, squeezed to the left of backward point
length delivery on the middle and Umar Amin, who has looked the more secure of the two debutants, pushes it to the mid-on region
a lovely slower one, dipping on the off stump line, fullish, Umar Amin jabs it out to the off side
Well played. It was a length delivery on the off and middle and Umar Amin presented the full face of the bat and the high elbow as he punched it straight back down the track
the bouncer but it sails just down the leg side. Amin allows it go through.
length delivery on the off and middle, Amin tries to hit on the up - not an easy task on this track- and ends up chipping it in the air to the on side. No real danger though.
slings it full and it moves in but drifts the leg stump line and hits the pad. Malinga lets out a cry of agony. You can see his plan: He was going for the lbw there but just got the radar wrong
gets forward to push to the off side
length delivery on the off and m iddle, pushed out to the off side

It landed back of length around off and shaped away,. Amin landed on his heels as he went forward and was never in a great postion - he stabbed inside the line and was beaten. Kula smiles. Amin practices the shot again.
moves forward quickly and correctly this time and pushes it to the off side
leans across to drive to mid-off
full in length and around off stump line, Umar Amin goes for his first big shot - a big cover drive but the bat rotates in his hands and he ends up slicing it to the right of backward point
back of length, just outside off stump, run down to third man
moves away from the off stump, Shahzaib chases it and pokes at it. No wood on leather though. Umar Amin walks across to have a chat.
edged but short of the slips From wide of the crease, Malinga got it straighten around off stump, Shahzaib leaned forward to defend and got the edge
Edged but again short of the first slip It shaped away from back of length and it kicked up as well. Shahzaib was looking to defend but the ball moved away late and caught the shoulder of the bat

Almost run out Shahzaib The pressure of dot ball and the inexperience. It was pushed towards short mid-off and he rushes across for a non-existent single. Malinga rushes forward, picks up the balll and misses the stumps with Shahzaib well out of the crease...
beaten again. What a over. This one too straightens outside off and Shahzaib, who has looked very shaky so far on his debut - pushes inside the line and is beaten. Again.
beaten  outside off. Full in length and it moves away from the off stump, Umar Amin drives inside the line!
just outside off stump, pushed out to backward point
leans across to punch the length delivery to covers
Whoa! A wild shot from the batsman. Pressure showing. It was a length delivery outside off and Umar Amin has a wild swing and a miss. For some reason, Sanga appeals. Kula doesn't.
pushes towards mid-off and they rush across
cuts in from just outside off , moves past the defensive poke and hits high  on the pad
Length delivery that straightens around the leg and middle line, rolls away of the pad to backward square-leg

Lovely slower one Full and outside off, Umar Amin didn't pick it up properly and pushed out at it. He checked his shot in the end and the ball was in the air but luckily for him it went through the gap in covers

Malinga follows the slower one with a bouncer that does the trick. It climbed rapidly on Umar Amin who went for the pull but was beaten by the pace. The top edge saw the ball swirling down towards Sangakkara who had to lunge out in the end to take it. Pakistan 11 for 2 and wobbling.
length delivery that straightens outside off, run down to third man

Shahzaib's woes continue. It was a back-of-length delivery that skidded on straight, Shahzaib pushed outside the line and was struck in front of the middle stump. It hit him high though. It would have gone over the stumps.
similar delivery but Shahzaib gets the bat in line this time and pushes it wide of mid-on
pushes it down the leg side for a wide
around the off stump, Shahzaib  mistimes his shot to the on side
length delivery on the off and middle line, moves past the prod and strikes the pad high
cuts in from outside off stump, tapped to the on side
First really full delivery and Shahzaib lifts it over mid-off. The length allowed him to free his arms.
moves down the track and defends towards mid-on. Hmmm...interesting
shorter in length and Shoaib stays back this time to punch it well to the left of the diving backward point
short in length, on the off and middle, tapped to the on side
full in length on the middle and off line, slower in pace as well, pushed towards mid-on
moves in from outside off, defended to point
Shahzaib releases some pressure with a big shot. It was short in length and drifting towards the pads and Shahzaib swung it over square-leg.
full in length, on the middle stump line, defended back down the track
length delivery outside off stump, pushed out to short extra cover
moves down the track, and forces Kula to alter his length and pushes it to the cover point
full delivery on the middle and leg, on driven wide of mid-on
Shout for lbw as Shoaib didn't offer a shot. It was missing off stump, though. It tilted in from well outside off and hit him well outside off as well
homing in on the off stump this time and Malik defends to the off side
Punchy! It was a short of length delivery just outside off and Malik pressed back to play a classy punchy shot between the bowler and Murali at mid-off
cuts in to the leg and middle line and hits the pad..
just outside off stump, defended to the off side
moves in towards off stump, Malik jabs it to the on side ..
this one shapes away from the off stump, Malik pushes it carefully to the off side
And this one comes in, defended of the back foot. One in and the other out.
In and out. So this one went out from short of length. Malik dabs it to point

And the pressure gets to him. Shoaib Malik rushes down the track, looking for the big hit but Angelo shortened the length. Malik tried to go through with the shot and went for an on-the-up hit but only managed to edge it.
full in length around off stump, defended to the off side
leans forward to drive to left of mid-off
short in length, just outside off stump, defended to the off side
cuts in to the middle and leg and rolls away of the pad to fine-leg
stays back to punch it to covers
cuts in from back of length, towards off and middle, pushed out to the leg side
lands on a length and straightens outside off, tapped to the on side
bouncer but too high. Wide surely? And yep, Doctrove extends his arms

Shahzaib combusts. It was a short-of-length delivery cutting into him and Shahzaib tries to slog it over mid-on but makes contact with the top half of the bat due to the bounce. The ball lobs gently towards mid-on. It was a very struggling innings and it's over now.
just outside off stump, straightens a touch, pushed out to the off side
Big heave and edges it to his pad Angelo slips in a slower one and Afridi drags his big shot to his pad.
cuts in from just outside off, Afridi was cramped for room but manages to chop it to third man
length delivery straightens outside off stump and Umar Akmal covers his off stump and shoulders arms
pushes it well down the leg side and Sanga makes a diving take. And tries to fool the umpire from giving it as a wide with an appeal. Seriously?!
gets forward to tap it to the off side
short of length on the off, defended to the off side
Thwack! It was a slower one, full outside off, and Afridi picked it up early, waited for it to arrive and smashed it over the cover boundary
Thunderous Wallop! Poor length, though. Overpitched just outside off, right in the slot and Afridi thumps it superbly over long-off
Maharoof changes his length this time and gets the ball to cut back in. Afridi pushes out at it and edges it behind square-leg
takes a big step forward early, waits for the bowler to slip but Maharoof hits the right length and line and Umar defends
Ah! It was a slower delivery, bouncing well outside off from short of length, Afridi takes the bottom-hand of the handle and swats it past square-leg
gets behind the line of the back-of-length delivery and defends
gets on the back foot and pushes towards mid-on for a quick single. It could have been tight had the rapidly advancing Kulasekara picked up the ball
another slower one to Afridi who calmly taps it to third man
banged in short outside off, Umar Akmal moved right across, hopped back, got on top of the bounce and wristed it down and past square-leg
goes for the yorker and Afridi digs it out back to Angelo who has a lovely smile as he looks at the batsman

takes a step forward early - he planted his front leg across towards the off stump- and tried to work the length delivery from outside off to the on side. A leading edge takes the ball through cover point
The slower one works this time. Afridi was looking to come down the track and then tries to adjust to the lack of pace and jab it away but misses it

Edged Almost caught by a diving Sanga. It was a full length delivery well outside off and Afridi tried to whip it across the line to the leg side. The inside edge took the ball low to the left of Sanga who dived but couldn't reach in time
gets forward to push it to covers. Afridi says some thing to Umar
Again, he moves forward very early, gets outside off and then tries to leave a short-of-length delivery outside off but is late in getting the bat out of the way. The ball rolls of the edge

Umar is almost run out: He pushed it towards short mid-on and set for a run. Maharoof dashed across and lunged out  to stop the ball but he was slipping when he released the throw. The ball went wide of the mark with Umar well short of the crease
short in length and outside off, cut to deep backward point
the bouncer on the middle stump line, pulled down behind square-leg for a single
back of length, just outside off, dabbed to backward point
short in length, kicks up on the middle, worked behind square-leg
That step forward and outside off again. He then deflects it from outside off to midwicket for a single
back of length on the middle, worked through midwicket for couple of runs
goes back to clip it behind square-leg
That trigger movement again and he then works the ball to the on side through midwicket
back of length around off stump, punched to mid-on
short in length and outside off, punched towards sweeper cover
short in length and it goes past Afridi's cut and it bounces once before it reached the keeper

Lovely slower leg cutter It completely opened up Afridi who stabbed at it and the ball cut away from the off and middle line and went past the off stump. It didn't miss by much. Maharoof holds his head.
really full delivery on the middle, turned to the on side .
spins in from outside off stump and Umar, who likes to slog sweep and cut, goes for the cut shot from the middle stump line. He finds backward point
slower, fuller, worked behind square-leg
moves down the track but the ball dips rapidly on him and he drives to long-off
full delivery around the middle and leg, reverse paddled to backward point
goes back to try to jab it of the inner edge to short fine-leg region
Same trigger movement against the seamers for a while now. He moves early, places his front leg just outside off and this time, defends to the off side
shuffles across again and clips it towards deep backward square-leg for couple of runs
full in length and outside off, worked away past square-leg
short in length and outside off stump, Umar's weight was on the front foot by that trigger movement and he couldn't connect with his cut shot
goes back this time and works the short-of-length delivery from outside off to square-leg
How did that miss the off stump? It cut in from outside off, Afridi tried to work it across the line and missed. The ball went through the bat and pad gap and somehow missed the off
spins in from outside off, Umar goes back to work it to short midwicket
reaches across to play a neat paddle shot past short fine-leg fielder. Samaraweera rushed back to make a sliding stop near the boundary
really full delivery on the middle, driven to long-off
turns to wards the pads, worked behind square-leg
Violence! Shahid Afridi rushes down the track and clubs the flighted off break over long-on
fetches it from outside off and sweeps it past square-leg
slower one around off, tapped through gully region
short in length and outside off, punched wide of third man for couple of runs
extra bounce on that one.. outside off stump, Umar is beaten, trying to ping third man
And again. This time beaten by the slower one. Samaraweera comes across to say something to Maharoof
And this time he makes contact and sends the ball wide of Kula at third man
short in length and drifts down. Umar shuffles across to glide it to fine-leg region
What a shot! It was delivered from round the stumps and Shahid Afridi moved down the track and lifted it over the straight boundary. Fab hit.
outside off stump, tapped to short third man
top spinner, going away from Afridi from round the stumps, worked through point
the off break from round the stumps, spinning into the middle stump line, Umar was cramped for room and was in danger of being lbw but manages to bring down the bat at the last second
goes back to turn it past square-leg
leans forward to tap it through point

Umar is run out by Dilshan. It was pushed towards short cover point and he set for a risky single. Afridi sends him back. Meanwhile, Dilshan had moved to his left from short cover, picked the ball and fired the direct hit. Gone! A good partnership ends. Game changes again. Fascinating.
on a length around middle, defended to the on side of the pitch and Malinga picks it up
slips to the pads, flicked away for a single
And that's his 6000th right?! He runs it down to third man . Thanks for the notice Sujan!
full delivery around off, driven to mid-off
bouncer, chest-high, around off, Akmal hops and opens the bat-face to guide it through gully
from round the stumps, off break, leans forward to defend and the ball rolls of the pad to the on side
presses back to defend to the off side
loopy delivery, dips on the middle on a length, Kamran leans forward to ease it to wide mid-off region
Oooh! It turned in from the middle stump line and Afridi seems surprised that it turned in to him and didn't go out .. he just jabbed at it and it hit his pad and misses the leg stump
gets forward to lift it to long-off where Angelo does well to push the ball back into field of play .. he hopped over the line and pushed the ball back in as he went out
What an innings this is proving to be. It was a flighted off break from round the stumps and he leaned forward to smoke it over long-on! He has been going after Murali in style
full delivery on the middle, pushed out to the off side
short in length outside off stump line, dabbed to left of backward point .. fumble and they cross over
the bouncer on the leg stump line, Afridi ducks and it goes down leg. Wide.
bounces towards the rib cage, worked behind square-leg
the slower one, dips on the leg stump line, turned past square-leg
banged in short on the middle and off, pushed out to covers

Edged but falls short of fine-leg. Almost a game-breaker. Malinga holds his knee and hangs his head down. It was the bouncer and Afridi went for the pull and top edged it but it falls short of the fielder in the deep. Afridi smashes his bat on the ground, no doubt angry with himself  for playing that false shot
from round the stumps, on the leg stump line, worked past square-leg
on the middle stump line, leans forward to defend
Shout for lbw but point of impact was just outside off. It was from round the stumps, Kamran leaned forward to defend and was hit on the pad
goes back to defend to midwicket
on the leg and middle line, turned to right of midwicket
Monster hit! Shahid Afridi is da Boss! He is tonking Murali today.. This time he rushed down the track and lifted it over wide long-on boundary.
around the off stump, worked wide of point
Edged to third man. False stroke. He wanted to lift Maharoof over wide mid-off region and edged it towards third man. But it fell well short of the fielder
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
leans forward to drive to the off side
on the middle stump line, defended to the on side
runs it down to third man for a single
gets behind the line to defend
on the middle stump line, pushed out to the off side
slightly slower outside off, worked to backward point
short in length outside off, cut to left of covers where Dilshan makes a half-stop
Superbly done. It was the slow bouncer outside off, Afridi waited, opened the bat-face and upper cut it to third man
slower off cutter this time, chopped to short third man
leans forward to drive through the on side
short in length and outside off, run down to third man
Blasted! The short delivery and Afridi pulls it to the wide midwicket boundary.
on a length, around the leg and middle line, tries to work it to the leg side and is hit on the pad
gets forward to defend and the ball back spins past the off stump
Thump! 150 up. Kamran knives the length delivery over mid-on. Smashed!
reaches across, picks the off break from outside off and sweeps it to the boundary

Kamran Akmal is run out Oh dear ... Caught in a yes and no situation. Afridi had tapped the doosra to short point region and took couple of steps down the track and Kamran hared down the track. Afridi saw Sanga rush towards the ball and froze. He shouted out at Kamran to get back. Too late. Sanga threw the ball to Murali who removed the bails.
plays the sweep shot to get a single
topspinner around off stump, leans forward to defend
flighted outside off, pushed to covers
spins in to the middle, worked to short midwicket

Drama Ouch! Afridi just didn't see the ball. He completely lost the sight of the ball.. It was a short of length delivery and he just didn't see it. He shaped to duck and then just stabbed it with his eyes shut .. the ball ran of the outer edge to third man!
A sharp bouncer and Afridi sways away from the line of fire
A fiery bouncer this time and Afrdi was hopping up, looking to play it before he just about manages to sway away. The ball flew over his right shoulder

.. A very good slower one on the middle stump line .. Afridi hops, doesn't pick the slower one early but reads it at the very end and does really well to glance it away and the ball runs the fine-leg boundary!
reaches forward to misttime the drive to left of mid-off
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
backs away to cut the off break to deep point
Afridi is cramping up. He went down on his knee to play the sweep shot and didn't connect well. He then  drops the bat and limps to the off side. he seems ok now
pushes the doosra to point for a single
from round the stumps this time, slightly short in length outside off, cut to deep point
leans forward to defend the flighted top spinner
Shot! Perhaps anticipating a Afridi charge down the wicket, Murali dropped it shorter. Afridi quickly went back to cut it to the backward-point boundary. He is on 91 now from 57 balls
good delivery. It kicks up from  back of length and Razzaq is surprised by the extra bounce and takes the bottom-hand of the bat as he stabs the ball down the track
pushes this delivery to the on side
width on offer outside off and Razzaq drives to right of Tharanga at sweeper cover
homing in on the off stump, keeps a touch low, pushed out to the off side
around off stump, guided to point
slower one, worked to square-leg
short in length, straightens around the off stump, punched to left of covers
outside off stump, run down to third man
around the off and middle line, defended of the back foot
cuts in from outside off stump, jabbed to the on side
a high bouncer and it has been rightly called a wide
slower one around off, dabbed to backward point
length delivery around off stump line, driven to deep cover
in the channel outside off and Sanga collects
on the middle stump line, whipped to right of short midwicket where Samaraweera makes a diving stop
fuller, on the middle, worked straight to Samaraweera
And this time he wrists the full delivery to the left of the diving Samaraweera

Loud shout for catch and a struggling Afridi, cramping up severely, falls down to the ground. Drama. It was a very good bouncer on the off and middle line, Afridi went for the pull and it flew over the bat and over the right shoulder and went to the keeper. Even as Sanga was appealing, Afridi was going down.
leans forward to drive to sweeper cover and limps across
fullish, on the middle, worked to midwicket
in the zone outside off stump and Afridi is beaten, pushing inside the line
goes down the leg side  .. Wide
stays back and plays a very compact defensive shot back to the bowler
slower one and Afridi pulls to towards deep midwicket
banged in short, moves in towards Razzaq who swats it to short midwicket
short in length and it stops a touch on Razzaq who jabs it to covers
low full toss, pushed to long-on
stays back to defend to the off side
outside off stump, run down to third man
moves outside leg and flat-bats it down to long-on and  limps across
bouncer on the off and middle line and Razzaq sways away
another bouncer and Razzaq allows it to pass through to Sanga
Kula pushes this wide outside off stump and Razzaq cuts fiercely to the backward point boundary. The extra delivery has proved very costly
slower one, bouncing from short of length, Afridi tries to run it to third man but misses. Both Afridi and Mathews have a laugh about it

A hundred after nearly five years. One of the very best ODI tons. Ever. And a nice way to bring it up. It was a short-of-length delivery outside off and he opened the bat-face and cut it to backward point boundary. There was no violence it. Just like this innings. You might look at the strike rate and think he went berserk but he didn't. It was a special knock. He went after Murali with some calculated agression. Almost out-of-character innings. He has rarely shown this patience. Afridi last scored a century in 2005, against India in Kanpur.
moves across to tap this to cover
gets forward to defend to covers
runs this one to third man
goes for the big swing to the on side and misses it. Cramps up again He hobbles to the on side. Will he call for a runner? No he doesn't.
beaten by the doosra.. he lunged forward to defend and pushed inside the line

A hobbling limping Afridi hits another six! what a champion. And he falls down to the ground after completing the hit. He rushed down the ground and crashed it over long-off. One would have thought with this condition, he wouldn't have risked going down the track but then this is Afridi.  This is Lalla  He does things differently. He is lying down on the ground in pain.  He now gets up and gets ready
turtns down the leg sdie, ,top edges the sweep and it rolls towards fine-leg. Afridi hobbles across
turns in from outside off, pushed out to covers

What a catch. Stunning reflex from Sanga but stand up and applaud for Shahid Afridi. What a treat to watch. What a special knock. It was a ripping off break that turned and bounced into Afridi who trying to back away for the cut shot. He ended up jabbing it of his gloves to right of the keeper. Sanga was moving his hands to outside leg, coverin for the original trajectory, but reacts very quickly to lunge across to his right and behind him to take a stunner. A special innings took a very good delivery and a special catch to come to an end.
Two slips in place and Aamer defends
stays back to work it to the on side
fullish, on the off stump line, from round the stumps ,pushed out to covers
full in length and outside off, driven to sweeper cover
outside off stump, mistimes the cut but will pick up a single
outside off stump, run down to third man
outside off stump , slashed to third man

on the middle stump line, pushed to point and there is a direct hit on the striker's end. The batsman was already home. and they take two extra runs as the ball ricochets through midwicket! Direct hit and overthrows ..poor fielder
short in length and outside off stump, punched towards deep point
in the zone outside off stump, swing and a miss. Malinga is yet to find his radar in this over.
He finds it this delivery. It kicked up from back of length and moved past the defensive poke and went to Sanga
And again. Aamer is not moving in line. He is on the leg stump line and is flirting dangerously outside off
And so Malinga fires another ball in the corridor but Aamer doesn't hang his bat out this time. He shoulders arms. He was bowling with a 7-2 offside field there
spins in from the stumps and Sanga collects down the leg side
Shout for lwb It turned in towards middle and leg. Replays show it would have turned down the leg side
clips this to the on side for a single
Edged short of Mahela at first slip, IT was a flighted off break and Aamer lunged out to defend and it went to right of Mahela, standing slightly deep, who dived but it didn't carry
turns away from Aamer who pushes it to backward point
goes back to work it to the on side for a single
Lovely delivery, in the corridor outside off and Aamer is beaten on the drive. No wood on leather and no leather on wood.

What a fabulicious delivery! too good for Aamer! It was full in length, landed on the off and middle and Aamer actually tried his best to defend it and get some bat on it. But the ball shaped away late to hit the off stump. Waqar Younis stares on from the dressing room. Nervous tension in that camp.
full delivery, not quite a yorker, pushed out to the on side
drama! A superb bouncer and Razzaq top edges his weak pull. It flies towards backward square-leg and Sanga hares down after it but can't reach it. Malinga holds his head. Agony for him.

What an awesome slower one delivery from Malinga! For sure, Shoaib wasn't expecting. He was probably thinking of a yorker. Even a bouncer. And there comes a lovely loopy dipping slower one. Shoaib is stunned, gets forward and just pushes out at it. Checks his shot. And the ball lobs towards mid-off. Malinga roars. And they then they were one. What a game this has been. What will happen now? Oh what drama. What a roller-coaster ride. What tension
oooh  in the corridor outside off and Asif is beaten. Malinga lets out a cry of agony; it was that close to the outside edge
backs away to cut to backward point
leans forward to push to covers
goes right back to defend
Four! Razzaq stirs into action. Finally. A short of length delivery outside off and Razzaq cuts to the backward point boundary
goes back to turn to the on side
goes on the back foot and pushes it wide of cover point for a single
A high bouncer and Razzaq lets it fly over him. Wide.
short in length, on the middle and leg, rolls away to leg slip region. Asif comes running but Razzaq sends him back. Wise decision. Imagine Malinga to Asif!
short in length again, tucked to midwicket this time
Sharp fielding from Dilshan. Razzaq had smashed a full pitched delivery to right of covers where Dilshan makes a good diving stop
short in length and it kicks up and Razzaq chips it to the on side of the pitch. He is concentrating on playing out this over. Sensible. Only one man can win this for Sri Lanka and that's Malinga.

Asif is almost run out Sanga misses ! Oh what drama. It was the lifting delivery, the ball rolls to leg slip.. they run. Sanga gets across and flicks the throw but misses the striker's end.. Malinga winces, Sanga yelps, and the fielders in the circle shout out in agony.

Would you believe it? Malinga had one delivery at Asif. Just one delivery. It was to be the end of his spell. And what does he do? He fires it on a length, it lands on the middle and it moves towards off and middle line. Asif didn't have the skill to cope with it. His back leg was moving towards leg stump even as he stabbed in thin air. Leather on wood. Clatter! Game over! Spare a thought for Shahid Afridi. What a great innings it was but he had to finish up on the losing side.
